attributes.action: censure MP Chris Mole in respect of his call for the sacking of Jeremy Clarkson
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MP Chris Mole has demanded of the BBC that they sack Jeremy Clarkson following the presenter's recent joke about the killing of prostitutes by truck drivers.  The important word here is "joke"... a comedic exaggeration of what is an unfair stereotype certainly, but we would prefer MPs stick to doing what we elect them to do rather than censoring entertainment programmes or trying to tell people what is or is not funny...

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
